No monetary union (piBar=0): eliminates inflation channel entirely. Tests a different regime not robustness of baseline claim. Analogous to a placebo.
High inflation low cost union (piBar=0.5 psi=0.1). Tests a different monetary union regime rather than robustness of baseline calibration.
Strict inflation targeting (piBar=0.02 psi=1.0). Tests a different monetary policy regime rather than robustness of baseline calibration.
Interest rate exceeds discount rate (r=0.06 > rho=0.04). Different dynamic regime. Duplicate of rho_0.040.
r slightly exceeds rho (r=0.06 rho=0.05). Different dynamic regime. Duplicate of rho_0.050.
